instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437 missing ppvrtc_g3h
threads.message:
have a [URL="tel:820-3437"]820-3437[/URL] Logic board with short on ppvrtc_g3h. I removed u1900 still short. Try to inject voltage (3V) but it only draw0.190A so around 0.58W. Any tips to next step?

Ppvrtc only give 1,3ohm.

it is liquid damage. Good cleaned before I got it..

threads.title: 820-3437 missing ppvrtc_g3h
threads.message: There are only a few caps on PPVRTC, start ripping them off and praying. This may end with a dead CPU.
